tool.name: Count hits per gene and cluster
tool.help:
usage: countandcluster.py [-h] [-b BAM] [-i INDEX] -c CLUSTERS [-p MINPROP] [-g GENEOUT] [-o CLUSTEROUT]
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit -b BAM bam alignment file -i INDEX bam index -c CLUSTERS Tab-delimited file with genes and clusters -p MINPROP minimum proportion of cluster covered -g GENEOUT output file for gene counts -o CLUSTEROUT output file for cluster counts
